segments.text: As I watch the boy on the stool, I can’t help but feel a pang of anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he leans over to grab another cookie makes my stomach drop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost as if time slows down, and I can see the potential for disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, his sister waits eagerly, her eyes sparkling with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they think about the mess they'll cause if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains blissfully unaware, trapped in her domestic routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a reminder of how often we neglect the obvious dangers around us.
segments.speaker: PAR
